insert into shop_detail

#{openBadWarning}, #{warningKey}, #{warningWechat}, #{warningSms}, #{serviceType}, #{tablewareFeeName}, #{tablewareFeePrice}, #{isOpenTablewareFee}, #{towelFeeName}, #{towelFeePrice}, #{isOpenTowelFee}, #{sauceFeeName}, #{sauceFeePrice}, #{isOpenSauceFee}, #{shopTag}, #{fansName}, #{aliEncrypt}, #{orderWelcomeMessage}, #{shopType}, #{autoPrintConsumeOrder}, #{autoPrintCheckOutOrder}, #{enableDuoDongXian}, #{openGroupBuy}, #{openCashCouponBuy}, #{openPosGroupBuy}, #{openPosCashCouponBuy}, #{openRpay}, #{printOutDetails}, #{areaId}, #{provinceId}, #{cityId}, #{isOpenAddPrintTotal}, #{isOpenUserSign}, #{isOpenEmqPush},
mapper.update: update shop_detail set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},is_open=#{isOpen} address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_time = #{openTime,jdbcType=TIME}, close_time = #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIME}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_mode = #{shopMode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_user = #{addUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wait_red_envelope = #{waitRedEnvelope}, base_money = #{baseMoney}, high_money = #{highMoney}, shop_detail_index = #{shopDetailIndex}, geekpos_queue_islogin = #{geekposQueueIslogin}, geekpos_queue_last_login_time = #{geekposQueueLastLoginTime},is_new_qrcode = #{isNewQrcode}, is_user_identity = #{isUserIdentity},consume_number = #{consumeNumber},rolling_switch = #{rollingSwitch},sweep_mode = #{sweepMode}, open_union_pay = #{openUnionPay},open_money_pay = #{openMoneyPay},pos_plus_type = #{posPlusType} ,third_appid=#{thirdAppid}, dazhong_shop_id = #{dazhongShopId},dazhong_app_auth_token = #{dazhongAppAuthToken},integral_pay = #{integralPay},pos_open_table = #{posOpenTable}, open_pos_ali_pay=#{openPosAliPay},open_pos_union_pay = #{openPosUnionPay},open_pos_money_pay = #{openPosMoneyPay},open_pos_shanhui_pay = #{openPosShanhuiPay}, open_pos_integral_pay = #{openPosIntegralPay},open_pos_charge = #{openPosCharge},tv_mode = #{tvMode},modify_order_print_receipt = #{modifyOrderPrintReceipt},modify_order_print_kitchen = #{modifyOrderPrintKitchen}, open_pos_pay_order = #{openPosPayOrder},open_order_remark = #{openOrderRemark},open_pos_wechat_pay = #{openPosWeChatPay},template_type = #{templateType},wait_ip = #{waitIp},is_recommend_category = #{isRecommendCategory}, tv_text_color = #{tvTextColor},tv_background = #{tvBackground},tv_textbox_background = #{tvTextBoxBackground},wait_remind_text = #{waitRemindText},is_turntable = #{isTurntable},turntable_print_type = #{turntablePrintType},is_takeout = #{isTakeout}, open_pos_discount = #{openPosDiscount},apart = #{apart},open_many_customer_order = #{openManyCustomerOrder},fans_name = #{fansName},open_rpay=#{openRpay}, print_out_details=#{printOutDetails}, is_open_add_print_total=#{isOpenAddPrintTotal},is_open_user_sign=#{isOpenUserSign} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select s.id,s.ali_seller_id ,s.ali_appId,s.ali_public_key,s.ali_private_key,s.order_before,s.name,s.address,s.phone,s.open_time,s.close_time,s.status,s.remark,s.shop_mode,s.add_user,s.longitude,s.latitude,s.add_time,s.update_time,s.brand_id,s.update_user,s.is_open,s.tv_mode, s.is_pos_new,s.page_size,s.is_open_sms,s.notice_telephone,open_meituan,s.pos_version,b.mq_id, b.brand_name,s.city,s.photo,sm.name as shopmode_name,s.shop_detail_index,restaurant_id,appid, appsecret, mchid, mchkey,pay_cert_path,wx_server_id,is_sub,s.shop_tag,s.is_takeout,s.open_pos_discount, s.open_many_customer_order,s.fans_name,s.ali_encrypt,s.order_welcome_message,s.shop_type,s.auto_print_consume_order,s.auto_print_checkout_order,s.enable_duodongxian as enableDuoDongXian,s.open_group_buy,s.open_cash_coupon_buy,s.open_pos_group_buy,s.open_pos_cash_coupon_buy, s.allow_after_pay,s.allow_first_pay,s.area_id,s.province_id,s.city_id,is_open_emq_push from shop_detail s left join brand b on s.brand_id=b.id left join shop_mode sm on s.shop_mode=sm.id where s.state=1 order by b.brand_name asc,s.shop_detail_index asc
select id,name from shop_detail where brand_id = #{brandId} and state = 1

select s.*,b.brand_name,s.consume_confine_time,s.consume_confine_unit ,s.enable_duodongxian as enableDuoDongXian,s.open_group_buy,s.open_cash_coupon_buy,s.open_pos_group_buy,s.open_pos_cash_coupon_buy from shop_detail s LEFT JOIN brand b on s.brand_id = b.id where brand_id=#{0} and s.state=1 and s.is_open=1 ORDER BY s.shop_detail_index
select city from shop_detail where is_open=1 and state = 1 and brand_id = #{brandId} group by city
select * from shop_detail where state = 1 and is_open=1 and (city like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}), '%') or name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}), '%')) and brand_id = #{brandId}
select * from shop_detail where state = 1 and is_open=1 and city = #{city} and brand_id = #{brandId}
select * from shop_detail where state = 1 and is_open=1 and brand_id = #{brandId} order by shop_detail_index

SELECT s.id,s.name,IFNULL(s.slogan,bs.slogan) slogan,IFNULL(s.queue_notice,bs.queue_notice) queue_notice from shop_detail s LEFT JOIN brand b on s.brand_id = b.id LEFT JOIN brand_setting bs on b.brand_setting_id = bs.id where s.id = #{shopId}
mapper.update: update shop_detail set pos_waitred_envelope = #{state} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT sd.id, sd.name, sd.address, sd.phone, sd.is_meal_fee, sd.meal_fee_name, sd.meal_fee_price, sd.print_type, sd.is_use_service_price, sd.service_name, sd.service_price, sd.shop_mode, sd.allow_first_pay, sd.order_welcome_message, sd.pos_plus_type, sd.brand_id,sd.tv_ip, IFNULL(sd.close_continue_time,bs.close_continue_time) close_continue_time, IFNULL(sd.auto_confirm_time,bs.auto_confirm_time) auto_confirm_time, sd.auto_print_total, sd.allow_first_pay, sd.allow_after_pay, sd.print_receipt, sd.print_kitchen, sd.modify_order_print_receipt, sd.modify_order_print_kitchen, sd.open_pos_wechat_pay, sd.open_pos_ali_pay, sd.open_pos_union_pay,sd.open_pos_money_pay, sd.open_pos_shanhui_pay, sd.open_pos_integral_pay, sd.open_pos_pay_order, sd.open_pos_charge, sd.open_order_remark, sd.template_type, sd.print_meituan, sd.service_type, sd.tableware_fee_name, sd.tableware_fee_price, sd.is_open_tableware_fee, sd.towel_fee_name, sd.towel_fee_price, sd.is_open_towel_fee, sd.sauce_fee_name, sd.sauce_fee_price, sd.is_open_sauce_fee, sd.split_kitchen, sd.is_turntable, sd.turntable_print_type, sd.open_bad_appraise_print_order, sd.bad_appraise_print_receipt, sd.bad_appraise_print_kitchen, sd.auto_print_consume_order , sd.auto_print_checkout_order, sd.enable_duodongxian,sd.open_group_buy,sd.open_cash_coupon_buy,sd.open_pos_group_buy,sd.open_pos_cash_coupon_buy, b.brand_name, bs.red_package_logo brand_logo, bs.is_open_scm, sd.open_rpay, sd.print_out_details,sd.is_open_add_print_total,sd.is_open_user_sign, sd.is_open_emq_push from shop_detail sd LEFT JOIN brand b on sd.brand_id = b.id LEFT JOIN brand_setting bs on b.brand_setting_id = bs.id where sd.id = #{shopId}
select from shop_detail where id = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND brand_id=#{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT s.* FROM `shop_detail` s where s.brand_id=#{brandId}) p WHERE p.id NOT IN (select v.shopDetail_id FROM version_newpos_shopdetail v)

select s.id,s.`name`,s.area_id,s.province_id,s.city_id from shop_detail s where s.is_open=1 and s.state = 1 and s.brand_id = #{brandId}
and s.`name` like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
